Uses of Package
com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common

  • Packages that use com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common 
    Package Description
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common
    This package provides functionality shared by performance tools.
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajconsperf
    The upajConsPerf application package.
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajniprovperf
    The upajNIProvPerf application package.
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajprovperf
    The upajProvPerf application package.
    com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajtransportperf
    The upajTransportPerf application package.
  • Classes in com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common used by com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common 
    Class and Description
    ChannelHandler
    Performs the associated with setting up and using UPA Channels, such as initializing channels, reading, flushing, and checking ping timeouts.
    ClientChannelInfo
    Used by the ChannelHandler object.
    CountStat
    Keeps an ongoing count that can be used to get both total and periodic counts.
    DictionaryProvider.DictionaryRejectReason 
    ItemAttributes
    Class containing the attributes that uniquely identify an item.
    ItemEncoder
    Provides encoding of messages containing item data, in the forms of refreshes, updates, posts, and generic messages.
    ItemInfo
    Contains information about a particular item being published.
    ItemWatchlist
    Item requests list.
    LatencyRandomArrayOptions
    Latency random array options.
    MarketField
    Represents one field in a fieldList (used by MarketPrice and MarketByOrder messages).
    MarketPriceItem
    Market price item data.
    MarketPriceMsg
    Represents one MarketPrice message
    ProviderSession
    Represents one channel's session.
    ProviderThread
    ProviderThreads are used to control individual threads.
    ProviderThreadInfo
    Information associated with a ProviderThread.
    ProviderThreadStats
    Statistics associated with a ProviderThread.
    ProviderType
    Provider Type Enums.
    TimeRecord
    Stores time information.
    TimeRecordQueue
    Stores a queue and pool of TimeRecord objects.
    ValueStatistics
    Class for calculating running statistics for a given value(such as latency).
    XmlItemInfo
    Contains information about an item in the item list.
    XmlMsgData
    Manages message data information from an XML file.
  • Classes in com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.common used by com.thomsonreuters.upa.perftools.upajconsperf 
    Class and Description
    CountStat
    Keeps an ongoing count that can be used to get both total and periodic counts.
    ItemInfo
    Contains information about a particular item being published.
    ResponseCallback
    Callback used for processing a response message.
    ShutdownCallback
    Callback used for shutdown.
    TimeRecordQueue
    Stores a queue and pool of TimeRecord objects.
    ValueStatistics
    Class for calculating running statistics for a given value(such as latency).
    XmlItemInfoList
    Builds a list of items from an XML file.
    XmlMsgData
    Manages message data information from an XML file.
